data.title: In an unprecedented move, Afghanistan hands over key Taliban commander wanted by Pakistan as ties between the two countries continue on their rapid upswing.
Old laptop batteries could power slums: An IBM study analysed a sample of discarded batteries and found 70% had enough power to keep an LED light on more than four hours a day for a year
A boat smuggling 215kg of cocaine has been seized by the Royal Navy, after two Royal Marines snipers aboard a Lynx helicopter shot out its engines
Pope Francis on LGBT children, "We have to find a way to help that father or that mother to stand by their son or daughter"
New Horizons robotic probe awakened, begins exploration of Pluto
Syrian troops have repelled an attack by jihadists from the Islamic State group on a key military airport in the eastern Deir Ezzor province, killing more than 100 Islamic State Jihadists

Parthenon marbles: Greece furious over British loan to Russia | Greek prime minister says loan of statue from pillaged frieze puts end to British Museum argument that disputed antiquities are immovable
Paris mayor announces plans to ban diesel cars from French capital by 2020
Fifteen blinded after surgery with suspected infected tools
Superbugs are killing India's newborns, the New York Times reports -- and the entire world's at risk
